aws_vpc_endpoint_route_table_association.description: Manages a VPC Endpoint Route Table Association

route_table_id.description: Identifier of the EC2 Route Table to be associated with the VPC Endpoint.

vpc_endpoint_id.description: Identifier of the VPC Endpoint with which the EC2 Route Table will be associated.

id.description: A hash of the EC2 Route Table and VPC Endpoint identifiers.
